tips.text: Creating a new store and need some sample products? Try the `populate` command: https://shopify.github.io/shopify-app-cli/app/rails/commands/#populate
Did you know this CLI is open source? Get involved and learn how to contribute: [github link]
New to ngrok.io? Learn all about it here: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/shopify-admin-authenticate-app
Remember to keep your API updated! Read more about the latest release: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/shopify-api-release-october-2020
Did you know we release a new API version every quarter? Read more about API deprecation: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/api-deprecation-update-2020-10
How to Get Reviews for Your Shopify Apps: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/get-reviews-for-your-shopify-apps
Be sure to check Shopifyâ€™s Style Guide Polaris (https://polaris.shopify.com)
Reminder to keep your requested scopes limited to only necessary access
